detaileddescription.para: BOD is fixed (rescheduling has limited recoverable consequences).
BOD is fixed (rescheduling has recoverable consequences).
BOD is movable (rescheduling has minor consequences).
BOD is movable (rescheduling has no consequences).
BOD is single background task.

briefdescription.para: BOD rescheduling policy (listed in priority order).

detaileddescription.para: BOD offset is calculated in the center of existing BODs.
BOD offset is calculated adjacent to an existing BOD.

pCfg
Pointer to runtime configuration parameters (data must be static).
This function initializes the BB subsystem's runtime configuration.

simplesect.para: This routine must be called only once before any other initialization routine.

detaileddescription.para: Initialize baseband resources.

eventCback
Event callback.
Register operation completion handler.

memberdef.argsstring: (PalBbProt_t protId, BbBodCback_t execOpCback, BbBodCback_t cancelOpCback, BbProtCback_t startProtCback, BbProtCback_t stopProtCback)
memberdef.name: BbRegisterProt

briefdescription.para: Register protocol handlers for low power.
Start BB processing of given protocol.

detaileddescription.para:
protId
Protocol ID.
Enable BB and start processing the list of BODs. This routine may be called several times, if a protocol layers has several simultaneously-enabled operations. However, BbStop() must be called an equal number of time to disable the baseband.

briefdescription.para: Stop BB processing of given protocol.

detaileddescription.para:
protId
Protocol ID.
Disable BB processing of BODs.

simplesect.para: For any particular protocol, calls to BbStart() and BbStop() must be balanced to ensure that the hardware is disabled if and only if appropriate.

detaileddescription.para:
pBod
Pointer to the BOD to execute.
Execute the protocol specific BOD handler.

briefdescription.para: Set termination flag of current executing BOD.

simplesect.para: This function is expected to be called during the execution context of the current executing BOD, typically in the related ISRs. In the end, termination flag will help to decide if BbTerminateBod() should be called.

briefdescription.para: Get termination state of current executing BOD.

simplesect.para: true if termination flag set, false otherwise.
This function is expected to be called during the execution context of the current executing BOD, typically in the related ISRs.

detaileddescription.para:
Clock accuracy in part per million.
Returns the current BB clock accuracy.

RF setup delay in microseconds.
Returns the RF setup delay.

Scheduler setup delay in microseconds.
Returns the scheduler setup delay.

Maximum CTE length supported.
Returns the maximum CTE length;

briefdescription.para: Return the supported switching rates for the controller.

detaileddescription.para:
Switching rate support bitfield.
Returns the switching rate support bitfield.

briefdescription.para: Return number of antennae that the controller is supporting.

detaileddescription.para:
Number of antennae
Returns the number of antennae supported.

briefdescription.para: Return the maximum switching pattern length.

detaileddescription.para:
Maximum switch rate length.
Returns the maximum switching rate pattern length.

briefdescription.para: Return supported CTE types of this controller.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported CTE types.
Returns the supported CTE types of the controller.

briefdescription.para: Get delta between target and reference time. Only valid if target time is in the future.

simplesect.para: Positive number in microseconds if target time is in the future. Zero if target time is in the past or same compared with reference time.

briefdescription.para: Returns the ID of the active protocol.
